name: Adesmia miottoae
typeLocations: holotype BOTU;isotype ICN;isotype MBM;isotype PEL;isotype RB;isotype UEC
distribution: Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America);Santa Catarina (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America);
remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.521.1.5 Etymology: the name honours Professor Silvia Terezinha Sfoggia Miotto for her great contribution to Adesmia studies in Brazil, as part of the important work she undertook with the Leguminosae family as a whole, especially in the Rio Grande do Sul state, Brazil.
